name: Sliding Puzzle Block Terror
description:
Sliding Puzzle is a classic puzzle game of 15 or sliding puzzle, perfect for any age, it train your memory, your creativity, your imagination, your self-esteem and among others special abilities.

Train your mind and solve problems, to get as a reward an image that stimulates both your imagination, while increasing your confidence in your own abilities, no matter how old you are.

Sliding Puzzle Block Terror is a jigsaw puzzle in which you must slide the pieces of the puzzle to re-form the image, touching the block you want to move.

When the level is end, you can see the results. Also you verify your playing time while the moves that you need for to complete this jigsaw puzzle.

Sliding Puzzle Block Terror includes multiple galeries with 32 images, “terrifying and lovely” pictures.

If you need a clue for to finish the game, the same it can to show the block’s number for help you to reorgarnize the block.

This game is totally free and it is traslate to English and Spanish.

This popular game is well-known as magic square, slide puzzle, sliding block puzzle of sliding tile puzzle among others many names.

Game is perfectly adapted from mobiles or Tablets.

The access for Internet is only for to show the publicity.

Characteristics :

- 100% free.

- Record table that saves your best scores so you can overcome them.

- Statistical Record’block keeps you best score for you obtain the biggest score.

- 3 Different "Challenge" levels:

Easy, Normal or Hard.

- Different "Mode Game" :

* Classic: The time isn't a obstacle for to finish the different levels.

* Time Trial: Here you have a determinate time for to can finish the different levels of this game.

- Choose between several Languages.

- A lot of high quality images.

- Various “Mode Game” as well as “Challenge”. With this game you never bores.

- Exceeds your own record, in all of the levels.

- 2 Terror thematic galleries, with a total of 32 pictures.

- Choose the size of the board. It are different pieces (3x3 or 3x4).

- Play when and where you want, without Internet connection.

- You can play with your smartphone or tablet.

Download and join to the game Sliding Puzzle Block Terror. NOW!!!
